attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: To date approximately 300 people have been killed following the use of Tazers by police forces around the world. These weapons are classed as instruments of torture by the UN. Such instruments must only be used in the UK where there is a threat to human life. Any use where life is not threatened to be fully investigated with a view to criminal charges against officers involved. This will ensure that officers do not use these weapons as a first option.
